title: Bullish Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - ECOL - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Wednesday, shares of US Ecology, Inc. (Symbol: ECOL) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $61.03, changing hands as high as $61.21 per share. US Ecology, Inc. shares are currently trading trading flat on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of ECOL shares, versus its 200 day moving average:     Looking at the chart above, ECOL's low point in its 52 week range is $54.24 per share, with $77.15 as the 52 week high point - that compares with a last trade of $60.63.
